hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Lon Lon Ranch prospered under Ingo.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Theater

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Bow# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Spike Walls Left Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Boss Key Chest
